thread.title: Jennifer
thread.title_full: American Frame americanframe.com reviewed by Jennifer

author: Jennifer
title: Jennifer
text: I've placed many orders with American Frame in the past and always been happy with the products, service, and price. On my last order there was a minor error (a mat was cut with a rectangular opening instead of circular opening). I called customer service the next morning and they were very nice/apologetic and sent out the correct mat that day.
